error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'flavors_two_years_ago' (value: 25.0) was used instead of 'total_flavors_tried_so_far' (value: 75.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 75
The shop offers 100 flavors and she tried 1/4 of the flavors so she had 100*0.25 = <<100*0.25=25>>25 flavors 2 years ago
Last year she ate double the amount from the previous year so she had 25*2 = <<25*2=50>>50 flavors
2 years ago she ate 25 flavors and last year she had 50 flavors so she has had 25+50 = <<25+50=75>>75 flavors
The shop offers 100 flavors and she has had 25 flavors so she still needs to try 100-25 = <<100-25=75>>75 flavors
